title: 4, 7, 8 & 14A of the Student Support Act 2011 (No. 4 of 2011), and the Further

1. These Regulations may be cited as the Student Support (Amendment) 

Regulations 2023.

title: 4, 7, 8 & 14A of the Student Support Act 2011 (No. 4 of 2011), and the Further
heading: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 28th of August 2023.
text_raw: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 28th of August 2023.

title: 4, 7, 8 & 14A of the Student Support Act 2011 (No. 4 of 2011), and the Further
heading: In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Student Support
text_raw:
3. 

In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Student Support 

Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 93 of 2023)

title: 4, 7, 8 & 14A of the Student Support Act 2011 (No. 4 of 2011), and the Further
heading: 4. Regulation 4 of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting after
text_raw:
4. Regulation 4 of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting after 

paragraph 4(a)(iv) the following: 

“(v) 
notwithstanding subparagraph (iv), the courses listed in Part C of 
Schedule 2 will be considered to be post-leaving certificate courses for the 
purposes of these Regulations.”
text_norm: 4 regulation 4 principal regulation amended inserting paragraph 4(a)(iv) following (v) notwithstanding subparagraph (iv) course listed part c schedule 2 considered post-leaving certificate course purpose regulation

title: 4, 7, 8 & 14A of the Student Support Act 2011 (No. 4 of 2011), and the Further
heading: 5. Regulation 4(b)(i) of the Principal Regulations is amended by
text_raw:
5. Regulation 4(b)(i) of the Principal Regulations is amended by 

substituting the following: 

“(i) 
a course that takes not less than two years to complete and is 
provided by an approved institution that comes within the terms of section 
7(1)(a), (b), (ba) or (c) of the Act and is a course listed in Part A or B of 
Schedule 1 or a course listed in Part D of Schedule 2 which requires the 
successful completion of a course listed in Part C of Schedule 2 as a 
condition of entry; ”
text_norm: 5 regulation 4(b)(i) principal regulation amended substituting following (i) course take le two year complete provided approved institution come within term section 7(1)(a) (b) (ba) (c) act course listed part b schedule 1 course listed part schedule 2 requires successful completion course listed part c schedule 2 condition entry
